body.name: MSI Gaming GeForce RTX 3080 Ventus 3X Plus 10G OC LHR - 10GB GDRR6X NVIDIA GPU Graphics Card for PC Gaming, 320-Bit NVLink, Torx Fan 3 Ampere Architecture, Computer Video Graphics Cards (Renewed)
body.stockDetail: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 6 hrs 9 mins.
features: High-Performance GPU - The MSI Gaming GeForce RTX 3080 Ventus 3X Plus 10G OC LHR is equipped with a powerful GPU to deliver an exceptional gaming experience on your PC.

Ampere Architecture - The graphics card features NVIDIA's latest Ampere architecture, providing improved performance, efficiency, and ray tracing capabilities for stunning visuals in your favorite games.
10GB GDRR6X Memory - With 10GB of high-speed GDRR6X memory, this graphics card ensures smooth gameplay and quick load times for even the most demanding titles.
Triple Fan Cooling - The Ventus 3X Plus features three Torx Fan 3.0, ensuring optimal cooling and quiet performance, allowing you to game for longer periods without worrying about overheating.
Multiple Display Support - The card offers support for multiple displays with HDMI and DisplayPort connections, as well as NVLink for high-speed data transfer between compatible GPUs.
body.description: Upgrade your gaming experience with the MSI Gaming GeForce RTX 3080 Ventus 3X Plus 10G OC LHR, a top-of-the-line graphics card for gaming PCs. This high-performance GPU graphics card is designed to deliver stunning visuals and smooth gameplay for even the most demanding titles. With its advanced Ampere architecture, the GeForce RTX 3080 offers unparalleled performance, making it the perfect choice for serious gamers and PC enthusiasts.Featuring 10GB of GDRR6X memory and a 320-bit memory interface, this NVIDIA graphics card ensures lightning-fast performance and crystal-clear graphics. The RTX 3080 Ventus 3X Plus also boasts Nvlink support, allowing for seamless communication with other compatible devices. Its Torx Fan 3 cooling system ensures optimal temperatures, even during intense gaming sessions. With HDMI and DisplayPort outputs, this video card offers versatile connectivity options for your gaming setup. Don't settle for anything less than the best - experience the power of the MSI Gaming GeForce RTX 3080 Ventus 3X Plus 10G OC LHR graphics card today!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Great GPU great value runs great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This card was dead on arrival. Motherboard showed VGA error. No display. I tried everything under the sun to try and get it to work. Wasted hours of my life trying to figure it out. Did they actually test this card to see if it works? Thankfully I got a full refund. I don't think I will ever buy refurbished electronics from Amazon again...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Just save your money for a new card
reviews.reviewText: I bought this 3080 back in Dec 2022 it worked great till about 9 months later AFTER THE RETURN PERIOD ENDED took it apart to see the ones who did the refurb were a bit sloppy I recommend just saving a lil while longer to get a new card that’s what I’ll be doin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought it for a new PC build and it started shutting down in the middle of use then eventually stopped working all together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Did not include everything
reviews.reviewText: I did not come with a cord. And also no way to install into my computer without getting a bunch of different codes. It was advertised to include everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars QC needs to do a better job
reviews.reviewText: I understand this is a refurbished card however having missing and loose screws causes me to have concern if the GPU was refurbished correctly. This should have never been passed by quality control and instead sent back to the tech to remedy these issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the risk
reviews.reviewText: Stopped working after 8 months. Both Amazon's and MSI's warranties are expired

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Mid for 4k gaming
reviews.reviewText: I bought this 3080 last year for $700, it’s crazy to see the price still the same 9 months later, if you are 4k gaming, you are better off adding $400 for the 4080. This GPU runs HOT and is super loud. I couldn’t bare it so I upgraded to 4090, if you just play 1080 or 1440 then this GPU could maybe suit your needs. But will be outdated by 2025.On 4k low settings halo Infinite I was getting 90-100fps , tempature would spike to 85+, 76-78 with no cover on my case.
